Kup:

"Lord Elder, watch your back something is following you"said Kup he l=
ooked around and Elita had fallen sleep in a corder


From: Preston Carroll=

To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject:=
 Re: Back to the Ark


  
> Kup jumped to his seat and started to scan the =
area as well he started to run the security sistem and the shield

The secu=
rity system are running just fine. All lights are green and
everything is s=
howing in full readiness. The shield is also showing no
problem. Its integr=
ity is holding at 100% with only nominal
fluctuations. There are no recorde=
d breaches, and all appears normal.

As the grey dot appears its position i=
s sporadic and mobile, however
it never appears on the inside of the shield=
, only the outside. As the
computer monitors its position it appears to be =
following Tuscon and
Lord Elder, although it never gets too close to them.
=

Then, almost as if what ever it is becomes aware of the sudden
scrutiny fr=
om the Ark's sensors, the dot suddenly disappears from all
sensors.

(TAG)
=

Preston
